channel.title: Slow crystal bow
channel.description: hi i have a small problem my crystal bow shoots really slow it takes like 3mins for the next shot[br][size=1]Posted on: June 09, 2007, 01:16:48 PM[/size][hr]some 1 plz!!

item.title: Slow crystal bow
item.dc:creator: @Kitno Kitno
item.description:
@Kitno wrote:

Search

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] ==

You should see

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4212) { PkingDelay = 4; wepdelay = 4; UseBow = true; }

If not, keep searching until you find it ^^

Change PKingdelay and wepdelay to something smaller. Maybe its bigger. I forgot. Make sure you make both of them same. Also, make sure its the right ID. Theres like 10 crystal bows.

Read full topic
